choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews
Day 1: Breakfast - Overnight oats with banana slices and chia seeds; Lunch - Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables and grilled tofu; Dinner - Grilled fish with sweet potato mash and steamed broccoli.

Day 2: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with almond milk, frozen fruit, and granola; Lunch - Turkey lettuce wraps with avocado slices and tomatoes; Dinner - Baked chicken breast with roasted vegetables and brown rice.

Day 3: Breakfast - Greek yogurt parfait with mixed berries and honey; Lunch - Grilled salmon sandwich on whole wheat bread with lettuce, tomato, and mustard; Dinner - Baked sweet potato topped with black beans, salsa, and avocado.

Day 4: Breakfast - Chia pudding with almond milk and mixed berries; Lunch - Grilled chicken wrap with hummus, cucumber, and tomatoes; Dinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetables and quinoa.

Day 5: Breakfast - Overnight oats with banana slices and almond butter; Lunch - Turkey lettuce wraps with avocado slices and tomatoes; Dinner - Grilled tofu stir-fry with brown rice, vegetables, and soy sauce.

Day 6: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with almond milk, frozen fruit, and granola; Lunch - Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables and grilled chicken; Dinner - Baked sweet potato topped with black beans, salsa, and avocado.

Day 7: Breakfast - Greek yogurt parfait with mixed berries and honey; Lunch - Grilled salmon sandwich on whole wheat bread with lettuce, tomato, and mustard; Dinner - Baked chicken breast with roasted vegetables and brown rice.
